timeline.bodyText: This seems to require a file class. I guess this is a placeholder?
timeline.author: rdsr

replies.bodyText: Yeah, the DeleteFile class doesn't exist yet and a reference to it will cause test failures.
replies.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: curious to know, why don't we simply return this in these situations?
timeline.author: rdsr

replies.bodyText: This needs to return the subclass, which it can't guarantee to be ThisT. The self method returns the correct type because it is overridden in each subclass to return this.
replies.author: rdblue
